casebody.data:
Third Department,

January, 1957

(January 21, 1957) In the Matter of the Claim of Katherine Hutton, on Behalf of Herself and Minor Children, Respondent, against Ford Motor Company, Appellant. Workmen’s Compensation Board, Respondent.

Motion for a stay of proceedings before the Workmen’s Compensation Board and for an order placing the appeal on the calendar. Motion for stay denied. Decision reserved on motion to place the appeal on the calendar. Present — -Foster, P. J., Bergan, Coon, Halpern and Gibson, JJ.
